trans-unit.source: Provides a startup screen for a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序提供启动屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class to show an image in a startup window, or *splash screen*, when a WPF application starts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类，以在启动窗口中，显示图像或*初始屏幕*、 WPF 应用程序启动时。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method to display the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法以显示初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method to close the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法来关闭初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Specify the image to use in the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于在中使用的映像<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class can display any image format that is supported by the Windows Imaging Component (WIC).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类可以显示任何图像格式受支持的 Windows 映像组件 (WIC)。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, or TIFF format.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用 BMP、 GIF、 JPEG、 PNG 或 TIFF 格式。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a PNG file and it includes an alpha channel, the image is rendered using the transparency defined in the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像很 PNG 文件，并且它包括 alpha 通道，使用 alpha 通道中定义的透明度呈现图像。

trans-unit.source: You cannot include placeholder text in the splash screen that is later added by your code.
trans-unit.target: 在更高版本的代码添加初始屏幕，不能包含占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: If you want to include text in the splash screen, you must add it to the image file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要包含在初始屏幕的文本，必须将其添加到图像文件。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to write any code to display a splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 不需要编写任何代码来显示初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)] SP1, you can quickly configure a splash screen with default settings.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]SP1，你可以快速配置初始屏幕使用默认设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Splash Screen to a WPF Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/how-to-add-a-splash-screen-to-a-wpf-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向 WPF 应用程序中添加初始屏幕](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/how-to-add-a-splash-screen-to-a-wpf-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class displays the splash screen as soon as possible after the application is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类显示初始屏幕越早越好后启动应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen is displayed by using native code, before the WPF application instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建 WPF 应用程序实例之前，通过本机代码中，显示初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen is displayed in the center of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 初始屏幕显示在屏幕的中心中。

trans-unit.source: When the application is loaded, the splash screen fades.
trans-unit.target: 当加载应用程序时，淡入淡初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: When your application is compiled, the image is embedded as a managed resource in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 编译你的应用程序后，图像作为资源而嵌入托管程序集中。

trans-unit.source: If the application is localized, the image is embedded in the localized satellite DLL.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地化应用程序，则在本地化的附属 DLL 中嵌入图像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class is not available in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类不是在部分信任环境中可用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class cannot be used in XAML Browser Applications (XBAPs), because they use a different startup architecture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类不能在 XAML 浏览器应用程序 (Xbap)，因为它们使用不同的启动体系结构。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and display a startup window by using the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和启动窗口显示通过使用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen>类。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> class with the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的资源初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter follows the usual rules for embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`参数遵循嵌入的资源的一般规则。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> 类。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter specifies the name of the resource file, and not a URI.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`参数指定的资源文件和不的 URI 的名称。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 用于对非托管资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含嵌入资源的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The name of the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> class with the specified resource assembly.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的资源程序集初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.SplashScreen" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceAssembly` and `resourceName` parameters follow the usual rules for embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: `resourceAssembly`和`resourceName`参数按照嵌入的资源的一般规则。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> 类。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter specifies the name of the resource file, and not a URI.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`参数指定的资源文件和不的 URI 的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long it will take for the splash screen to fade after the close operation has been initiated.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，它指定初始屏幕在关闭操作启动后将需要多长时间淡化。

trans-unit.source: Closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 关闭初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: If you called the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method with the `autoClose` parameter set to `true`, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法替换`autoClose`参数设置为`true`，则不需要调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen will close automatically after the application is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载应用程序后，初始屏幕将自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: When the splash screen closes, the length of time it will take for it to fade is determined by the default value for the `fadeoutDuration` parameter, which is 300 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 当初始屏幕关闭时，它以淡入淡出花的时间的长度由的默认值`fadeoutDuration`参数，这是 300 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Displays the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically close the splash screen; <see langword="false" /> to close the splash screen manually.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 以自动关闭初始屏幕；设置为 <see langword="false" /> 以手动关闭初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Displays the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method with `autoClose` set to `true`, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法替换`autoClose`设置为`true`，则不需要调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen will close automatically after the application is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载应用程序后，初始屏幕将自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: When the splash screen closes, the length of time it will take for it to fade is determined by the default value for the `fadeoutDuration` parameter, which is 300 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 当初始屏幕关闭时，它以淡入淡出花的时间的长度由的默认值`fadeoutDuration`参数，这是 300 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method with `autoClose` set to `false` when you want to provide a non-default value for the fade duration.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法替换`autoClose`设置为`false`如果想要为淡入淡出持续时间提供一个非默认值。

trans-unit.source: You will have to call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method to close the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 你将需要调用<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法来关闭初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The resource specified in the constructor could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 未能找到构造函数中指定的资源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically close the splash screen; <see langword="false" /> to close the splash screen manually.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 以自动关闭初始屏幕；设置为 <see langword="false" /> 以手动关闭初始屏幕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the splash screen window should use the WS_EX_TOPMOST style; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始屏幕窗口应该使用 WS_EX_TOPMOST 样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示初始屏幕。
